name: Star Scooter (Demo Version)
description:
Star Scooter Demo.

This is an action-platform game (demonstration prototype). The plot is set in the distant future and follows the story of an 11-year-old boy who possesses the cosmic powers by harnessing the power of the precious stones called the Astro Gems. It is up him to stop the evil forces on Neptune from attempting to annihilate the Solar System.
